name: Scale Steps
description:
Play around with some music!

A scale is given, and all notes in the scale must be played. The final note, denoted by yellow, must be preceded with a note that is a whole step away from it. 

This was created for Trijam 47, hosted by Rocknight Studios, with the theme "One step to death". While it ended up being more of a toy than a game, it was fun to make.

Source code: Here
